transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Ji.
Customer: Anishka ji baat kar rahe hain?
Executive: Ji, mam.
Customer: Ji Anishka ji woh aapne yeh baat kar rahe hain.
Executive: Haan ji mam ji bataiye kya problem hai?
Customer: Aapki aawaz clear nahi hai.
Executive: Ek second mam, ek second.
(silence)
Customer: Hello?
Customer: Udhar se nikaal lo, udhar se nikaal lo.
Customer: Haan main yeh keh rahi, ji.
Executive: Hello?
Customer: Ji ji.
Executive: Ji Anishka ji aapko aawaz aa rahi hai?
Executive: Haan ji mam ji bataiye mam.
Customer: Aur maine na yeh kal hi hamara mera jo woh diya hai mam.
Customer: Baki woh active hui hai kal hi.
Customer: Toh maine apni 10 lead pe call kari.
Executive: Accha accha.
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Haan ji mam ji bataiye 10 lead aapne call ki 10 lead par call kari thi.
Customer: Yeh maine pehle se shortlist kar rakhi thi inse call ki.
Customer: Ek bhi call, ek bhi single call kaam ki nahi thi.
Customer: Adhiktar woh log jo hai job seeker the jinko job chahiye.
Customer: Aur ya phir woh the jinhone kabhi apply hi nahi kiya hai aisa kuch.
Executive: Hmm, mam accha.
Executive: Toh mam aapki koi welcome call hui hai abhi welcome call?
Customer: Nahi koi welcome call nahi aayi hai mujhe abhi tak.
Customer: Mujhe bataya gaya hai ki yeh mera kal kal raat ko koi chalu hua hai 7:00 baje kareeb 7:30 baje kareeb.
Customer: Toh mujhe bola gaya hai ki 24 ghante se 48 ghante mein aayegi call.
Executive: Ji ji actually mam na aaj na chutti hai na aaj ki.
Executive: Toh isliye main bhi office nahi gayi hu.
Executive: Toh warna aaj hi aapki welcome call hoti otherwise kal aapki welcome call hogi usme main aapko saari cheeze samjha dungi ek baar acche se.
Customer: Mam woh jo mam maine aapko kareeb ek call toh aisi hoti hai na jisko waqai mein requirement thi placement service ki.
Customer: Toh yeh toh yeh toh aapke yaha se bhi ho hi nahi rahi aisi.
Executive: Mam yeh toh depend karta hai buyer pe.
Executive: Jo woh requirement dalta hai situation yeh hoti hai ki woh requirement ek ko nahi dalte like aapne call ki hai aur seller bhi unko call karenge nahi maine maine dekhiye meri baat suniye maine kya cheez ke liye maine purchase kiya hai maine unko clear kiya tha mujhe B to B ke liye chahiye tha theek hai mujhe companies client chahiye thi jinko ki main apni placement service provide kar saku right clear cut tha yeh.
Executive: Ji ji.
Customer: Job seekers ke liye mere paas Justdial hai.
Customer: Justdial se mujhe job seeker bahut mil jaate hain.
Customer: Agar mujhe IndiaMART se itna heavy package lene ke baad bhi jo Justdial se mujhe bahut saste mil jaata job seeker hi.
Executive: Nahi nahi aisi baat nahi hai aapko milenge waha pe bhi B to B ke liye aapko client milenge but mam yeh toh main aapko abhi bolungi ki aisi nahi hai ki aapko ekdum mil jayenge jab aap usko daily use karoge ek main bolungi ki daily aap buylead consume karne ke baad aapki saari buylead se deal done hogi thodi mehnat hoti hai ki aap daily agar aapne MDC package liya hai toh isme teen buylead aapko daily consume karni hoti hai baki iski jo calls par inquiries aati hai woh buylead se alag hoti hai toh maybe agar aap mahine mein din mein teen buylead consume karte ho aur mahine mein lag jaata hai 80-90 buyer se aap baat kar rahe ho.
Customer: Toh 80-90 buyer mein se aapko 4-5 tab milenge aapko buyer toh yeh nahi woh naturally hoga ki zyada aapko mil jaaye but thodi mehnat hoti hai ki 4-5 buyer ke liye meri baat suniye.
Customer: 4-5 ke liye kya maine 4-5 buyer jinse telecallers nikaal dete hain.
Customer: Main 4-5 buyer ke liye yeh kharida hai.
Executive: Nahi nahi aap is tarah se karoge toh aapko nahi milega.
Customer: 4-5 buyer ke liye kharida hai IndiaMART.
Customer: 4-5 buyer toh jin ke telecaller hi nikaal deta hai mera.
Executive: Toh mam agar 4 se 5 buyer aapko milenge na toh woh yeh nahi honge ki aapko ₹10,000 ka business deke jayenge woh ek buyer hi aapko laakhon ka business deke jayega.
Customer: Haan woh samajh mein aa raha hai lekin toh 10 call mein se mam ek bhi aisi nahi thi jisko ki main real call keh saku.
Customer: It is assumed as a fake data.
Executive: Mam aapko kya lagta hai tha aapne jab aapne yeh purchase kiya tha?
Customer: Mam maine unko clear bataya tha mera recruitment service ka business hai main recruitment deti hu companies ko toh mujhe companies ka data chahiye unhone mujhe kaha tha ki hamare paas companies hoti hai jinko ki apni company ke liye staff chahiye hota hai yeh companies aapse contact karengi unhi companies ki hum lead denge lekin jo mujhe lead mili hai jo maine lead li hai aapke online portal pe jaakar woh sab keval job seeker hai individuals hai koi firm koi company hai hi nahi.
Customer: Aur waha pe likha hua hai ki woh company hai unka naam bakayda company ki tarah likha hua hai.
Executive: Okay okay toh mam ek baar aap please mujhe kal tak ka time dijiye kyunki mere paas abhi laptop nahi hai woh mera company mein hi hai toh ek baar mujhe na kal ka time de dijiye agar mujhe jo batai gayi hai mujhe woh service nahi milegi I need my money back then.
Customer: Agar woh service ki haan mahine mein 4-5 mil jayenge mahine mein 4-5 dene ke liye mere paas telecaller baithe hue hain sorry not mahine ki daily ki.
Executive: Please kal call kijiyega phir baat karte hain is baare mein.
Customer: Haan haan main kal aapko shaam mein phir call karungi saari buylead wagera aapki profile dekhungi baad mein okay.
Executive: Ji ji.
Executive: Okay okay.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer received job seekers instead of companies.

- No welcome call received after subscription activation.

- Dissatisfied with the quality of buyleads.



Resolution:

- Executive apologized for the inconvenience.

- Executive promised to review the account next day.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will review the account next day.

- Customer will call back next day.



Alert (If Any):

refund

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, subscription, refund, job seekers
